h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 5\. You Can Pick Up Missed Spirits at Keepers Shrines
content: If you ran into any Green Wisps early in Chapter 1 that only seemed to give a bit of Will before floating away, come back once you have the Gourd upgraded in the Bamboo Forest, and they can now be properly absorbed for much larger amounts of Will!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '5\. You Can Pick Up Missed Spirits at Keepers Shrines'.
The content is as follows:
If you ran into any Green Wisps early in Chapter 1 that only seemed to give a bit of Will before floating away, come back once you have the Gourd upgraded in the Bamboo Forest, and they can now be properly absorbed for much larger amounts of Will!
